title: 133Cm No Keshiki
alternative_title: 133cmの景色 ; Sight of 133 Centimeters Tall ; The World from a 133cm Tall
status: 133cmの景色 ; Sight of 133 Centimeters Tall ; The World from a 133cm Tall
description:
Description :
        The protagonist, 25-year-old Yoshino Hana, who works at a food company, stopped growing when she was in elementary school due to an illness and became an adult 133 cm tall. Hana faces her work and love life while sometimes facing the "difficulty of living" caused by the discrepancy between her age and her appearance. Note: this is a serialization of the one-shot.
